entities.name: death
entities.description: The concept of death is mentioned as the last enemy to be destroyed.

entities.name: harry
entities.description: Harry is mentioned in the context of understanding the meaning of 'death'.

entities.name: death eaters
entities.description: The Death Eaters are mentioned in the context of their idea of defeating death.

relationships.description: Hermione explains to Harry the meaning of 'death'.
Harry contrasts his understanding of death with that of the Death Eaters.
